name: Samir
info:
Samir does what she wants when she wants, and she loves to play harmless tricks on others.
She's a Hykros Executor and has the chops to show, but her unreliable personality and penchant to play tricks haven't earned her a lot of friends. She doesn't seem to care, though...
description:
Her past is riddled with questions.
Currently, it is known that she was an orphan adopted by a Banges resident. She joined Hykros after reaching adulthood, and became an Executor after training.

She's a great shot, even among the elite Executors. Hykros once considered asking her to become the instructor for new recruits, but gave up on the idea because her personality just didn't match.

skills.name: Dual Fire
skills.description: Tap normal attack while on the ground to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks with the dual pistols. First Attack: Deal total damage equal to 47.1% of ATK plus 2. Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to 35.8% of ATK plus 2. Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to 119.7% of ATK plus 6. Fourth attack: Deal total damage equal to 113.1% of ATK plus 6. Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to 154% of ATK plus 8 and launch the target.

skills.name: Bullet Rain
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to fire continuously at the ground, dealing damage equal to 50.6% of ATK plus 3 damage, each hit consumes 150 endurance.

skills.name: Energy Burst
skills.description: Hold attack button to maintain constant fire, each hit dealing 23% of ATK plus 1 base damage.

skills.name: Phantom Kick
skills.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Phantom Kick. Knock the target down and deal damage equal to 70.5% of ATK plus 4. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 98.7% of ATK plus 5 to nearby targets and strongly launch them.

skills.name: Rising Lightning Kick
skills.description: Tap normal attack after dodging to strongly suspend targets and deal damage equal to 122.6% of ATK plus 6.

skills.name: Electro Field
skills.description: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to 269.8% of ATK plus 14, and the last hit strongly suspends targets. Cooldown: 45-seconds.

skills.name: Domain of Thunder
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location, strongly suspending targets within range and dealing a total of 238.3% of ATK plus 13 damage over 3 attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for 3.5 seconds and deals damage equal to 42.4% of ATK plus 2 to a target every 0.5 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Volt
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly paralyze targets for 1 second and electrify them for 6 seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to 144% of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next 6 seconds.

advancement: Trigger an electrical explosion on the target after landing a critical hit, dealing additional damage equal to 30% of ATK to the target and nearby enemies. Cooldown: 0.2 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Increase crit rate to electrified targets by 40%. Electrical explosions extend the duration of electrified effects by 0.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
Double the duration of Electro Field and pull targets into the center of the attack.
Triggering an electrical explosion reduces skill cooldowns by 1 second.

traits.name: Trickery
traits.description: Grant 1 stack of Concentration for every 4 seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by 3%, and can stack up to 4 times. After being hit, Samir loses 1 stack of Concentration, up to 1 stack per 1 second.

traits.name: Shadow
traits.description: Grant 1 stack of Concentration for every 4 seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by 4%, and can stack up to 5 times. After being hit, Samir loses 1 stack of Concentration, up to 1 stack per 2 second.
